name: GraFi (itch)
description:
GraFi - casual, colorful,minimalist, physical puzzle with changing gravity.
Player goal is to relocate golden coin, using only the change of gravity, on the golden rock and keep for some time to pass the level.

In GraFi:

- Traps
- Changing gravity
- Cool Soundtrack
- Colorful art
- 50 levels
